nodes.text: The Prayer of Redemption was a chant used by the Shamed Ones Yuuzhan Vong who were involved with the Jeedai heresy.

This prayer was used to gain favor and as a means to better the circumstances of the Shamed Ones involved in the Jedi Heresy. It was formed on Coruscant after it was conquered by the Yuuzhan Vong empire and gained a high amount of popularity when the prophet Yu'shaa came into power.
